title: Part a. [0–4]
stimulusHtml:
4 points

1 point: For a correct statement of the conservation of momentum
Pi = Pƒ
m1v1i + m2v2i = m1v1ƒ + m2v2ƒ

1 point: For correctly substituting into the above equation
(0.30 kg)(2.0 m/s) + (0.10 kg)(–3.0 m/s) = (0.30 kg)v1ƒ + (1.10 kg)(1.2 m/s)

1 point: For a correct answer with units
v1ƒ = 0.60 m/s

1 point: For correctly indicating the direction is to the right

title: Part b. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

1 point: For answering "no", or that the collision is inelastic

1 point: For a correct justification
